runs.comm: charges down the track and looks for cover, but has to settle for an outside edge over short third man

off-stump is flat on the ground! This was flat and quick and Warner's cut is just a bit too slow! This is a huge wicket for Pakistan. Warner's been in outstanding form over the past few months. But Babar has outsmarted him. What a move by Pakistan.
not too much flight as he targets a line just outside off. Left alone
full on middle, Watson comes forward and blocks with a straight bat
drilled to long-on and it is through the desperate dive of Malik. On the front foot, reaches the pitch and has smoked this down the ground
turn outside off snares Watson's edge and the keeper takes it! That's two in the over for Babar. Pakistan are on a roll. Goes for another smash over the top but this grips and turns to foil him
pushed through on a length down the leg side and misses with the flick
goes back and punches into the off side
flighted on and around off stump as he gets forward and picks up a single through the covers
reverse sweep now from the new batsman, Maxi. First ball in the match for him and he is lucky to have his leg stump still intact
pushed down to long-on for a single
he was waiting abound four feet outside leg stump and pounds this flatter delivery that follows him through to deep midwicket
flighted outside off and this is slog swept to the man on the boundary in front of square
much slower this time as he flights it on off stump. Maxi defends with a closed face and gets a leading edge that goes to ground
the conventional sweep this time and he's picked the perfect ball for it. Drifting onto the pads and he's smacked it right off the middle
and he one-ups himself with a gorgeous lofted cover drive. Tossed up on off stump and he strode forward and launched it. Lovely timing
held this one back and he went for the sweep again. Big appeal from Babar as he is struck on the front pad. Would have gone down leg though
another reverse sweep and still no luck. Quick and flat and angled in at him. Another lbw appeal to no avail
100 kph, fired in just outside off. Finch looks for a swipe through midwicket but he's a little late on it
makes a bit of room outside off and he slaps it in front of point for a quick single
length on the stumps and Maxi's mauled it into the stands behind midwicket, right beside the Pakistan dug out
full and just outside off, but he stays back and heaves this along the ground to deep midwicket
drags the length down as he sees the batsman charging him. Dabbed to short fine leg
terrible line from Hafeez. He wants to cramp the batsman, but he's playing into Maxi's strength. That sweep shot has sailed over the boundary behind square leg. That's 15 off the over
full toss outside off, Finch drags it to midwicket on the circle
full and outside off, Finch essays a charming cover drive. Lovely timing but he hasn't placed it well. Straight to the fielder
shortish delivery on off stump, Finch makes room, waits for it and slaps it to the man at cover again

he is hitting them like a dream but this time he has smacked the bowler on the shin. That's going to form a big purple bruise later, but for now Gul has stopped a certain boundary. Full and straight and a thumping straight drive
slower ball just outside off and Maxi's tapped it beyond the reach of short third man. Gorgeous stroke, showcases the value of placement
full toss on off stump and Maxi accepts gleefully with a punch over point. A couple of bounces and into the boundary. Opened the face to find the placement again
fired in on leg stump and Finch is slow on the flick. Strikes him on the pads
leading edge into the covers. Doosra dupes Finch, who was looking for a tame flick towards midwicket
good length ball on the stumps, Maxi slogs and it goes on the bounce to the man at deep midwicket
he has nailed this! This was tossed up on off stump and Finch gets down on one-knee and slog sweeps him over midwicket. Don't need to place the ball when you hit it out of the park
cut against the turn and what makes this even better was it was flatter, quicker and it was honing on leg stump. Finch was waiting on it and slaps behind point.
goes straight on with the arm as Finch pokes at it with an open face. Single to short third
jumps outside leg and cuts the length ball from the stumps. Sweeper comes in handy
flighted on middle and Maxi's swept him all along the ground to deep midwicket.
short and just outside off, Finch backs away and slaps to point
flat and length on middle, Finch follows his partner's example and sweeps him over the square leg boundary. Concern on the face of Kamran behind the stumps
tapped to long-off as this is fired in on a length just outside off.
another 15-run over! Just drifting on the pads and Maxi has been brutal with that sweep shot. Absolutely no intention to keep it down. Australia have smashed 39 runs in the last three
full on middle and leg, Finch plants his front leg down the pitch and has lofted him wide of long-on. Clean and crisp hitting this
this is slightly slower and comes up as full toss on off stump, swiped through to deep midwicket

he is just hitting every gap in the field! This has a bit of room outside off and Maxi's cut him to the point boundary. Sliced to the right of the man inside the circle and to the left of the one in the deep
no point with posting a deep midwicket. This sails clean over his head. Took it up off a length and deposits it for an 83m six
that's his fifty!. Fourth-fastest overall in T20 cricket. Length again just outside off and Maxi's swung this over long-on
beamer! And it continues on it's merry way to the fine leg boundary. Searching for the yorker but it was well over waist high. Maxwell ducks and sways and gets out of the way.
low full toss outside off and he's creamed it to the extra cover boundary. That's 30 off the over!
tossed up outside off, Finch makes room and tries to flay it through the covers. Doesn't connect. Quite close to that inside edge
lovely bowling this. Slowed his pace and cramped the batsman on off stump. Not enough turn to envisage that back cut
flighted on off stump, he stays leg side of it and lofts towards the extra cover boundary. Long-off runs around to keep it to one
100kph, skips down the track as this is flatter on middle and leg. Struck to long-on
full toss on off stump, lofted and goes on the bounce to long-off
goes for a sweep, has been an incredibly productive stroke for him in this innings, but this time he wears it on the body
bit of turn as this is pitched on a good length. Finch cuts it from leg stump to the man in the deep
flat, hard and six over midwicket. That's the 100 off 51 balls between these two. Ajmal offers a quick length ball which has been mauled
flighted on middle and leg, swept away to the man in the deep
there's the doosra. Maxi was looking to flay it over cover, but the turn defeats him
worked away off the pads and behind square leg

another doosra and I cannot understand how that has missed off stump! Tentative push from Finch, who had not picked it and is lucky to survive as the ball bounces right over the off bail and thuds into the keeper's gloves and promptly falls out. There was an outside edge too Ajmal throws a forlorn look back as Pakistan drop a crucial catch
full and wide outside off, he looks to slice it down to third man but doesn't stretch far enough
dropped by the sweeper! This was a low full toss which he had sliced to Ajmal. He runs in from the boundary and has a couple of grabs at it, but grasses it. Second drop in two overs
shortish on and around off stump, cuts away to deep third man
another low full toss outside off and he carts it over to deep mdiwicket
clears his front leg and punts this length ball down the ground for a single
full toss outside off, slapped to long-on
thumped to the left of deep midwicket and Shehzad is the man who dives and pulls it back. Short ball to start

flighted on leg stump and he goes for a sweep. Lobs off the pad towards short third man. Gul sends the throw at the bowler's end for the run-out, but Afridi can't collect it cleanly and they sneak a second

slog off the front foot again, but this time he's picked out deep midwicket! He picked it off a length and it looked good for another six, but the man steadied himself on the boundary and clings on. End of a match-changing innings from Maxwell and Pakistan will breathe a giant sigh of relief. Star man does the trick
flighted outside off, Bailey wants to slap it through the covers and misses as the ball scoots under his bat
waits on the back foot as this too is flighted just outside off. Dabbed towards short third man
fired in on leg stump, Finch looks for a flick but is slow on the shot
sees the batsman making room very early and fires it full and wide outside off. Finch wouldn't have reached it had he tried
low full toss on leg stump, swept well past the short fine leg fielder. Easy boundary
slows it up and flights it on leg stump, Finch reaches forward and defends into the covers for a single
flighted on leg stump, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up on middle, pushed to long-off
pushed through on off stump, he goes back, makes some room and finds short third man
103 kph, flat and quick from Afridi and he gets a bottom edge. That was so close into crashing into the stumps
tapped to point as this is length on middle
full and targeting leg stump, Finch is stuck on the back foot and goes for the cut. Misses
makes room outside leg and slashes. Gets a thick outside edge that was in the vicinity of short third man. Gul had to motor back but he doesn't make it and it runs away to the boundary too
it's the one that goes straight on and Finch hasn't picked it. Goes for a slog sweep and misses. Struck on the body
flat and full on leg stump, nudged away for a single behind square leg
another doosra, this time Bailey reads it off the pitch and taps it to deep point
fired in outside off, gets it off the bottom of the bat as he cuts into the covers
nicely swept as this is a fuller delivery on leg stump. Beats short fine leg, but deep square is handy
jumped outside leg and Ajmal looked to dupe him by firing it full and outside off. Throws his bat and it and gets a handy bottom edge that evades the keeper and short third man
looks to lash this through extra cover, but Afridi has snuck through his defences and shattered his stumps. Pakistan sniff a chance to reclaim the advantage here
full and just outside off, slapped to deep point with an open face
powered to the square leg boundary. Fires it in on leg stump to make sure he doesn't give the batsman any room, but Finch has swept him away with complete authority
tossed up on off stump, pushed into the covers
126kph, he's fired that in on middle and off. Bunted to long-on
flighted on off stump, keeps the batsman to a forward defensive
low full toss outside off, carves it to deep point
full on off stump, Finch swings wildy and gets a thick inside edge to long-on

Ajmal, you beauty! This was hit like a rocket and he flings both hands up over his head at deep point and snares a very good catch! Pakistan are definitely pulling things back here. Full and outside off, Hodge had cleared his frong leg and had nailed this, but could not place it well enough. Ajmal wears a giant smile
almost a yorker on off stump, Finch stays beside it and creams through towards the extra cover boundary. The man in the deep is quick enough to stop it
full on middle, Finch has smashed this to the deep midwicket boundary. Didn't get it off the middle and the bat turns on impact, but he's found the gap
yorker outside off, Finch tries to dig it out but is beaten
doosra pushed full and across him, Haddin's sweep is way off the mark
waits on this length ball on off stump and steers it to short third man. Soft hands
he goes to the off side now and Ajmal fires it even further wide. Goes for a pull and he cannot connect. The keeper does extremely well to get behind it
yorker uproots leg stump! Finch is gone! What a crucial blow! He was struggling to get the big hits and Ajmal fires in just about the perfect ball. Finch swings but cannot get under it
another doosra pushed wide outside off and Coulter-Nile's slog sweep connects with a whole lot of air
only one run off that over! And a wicket too. Doosra to end it and Coulter-Nile's slog sweep amounts to nothing
walks across and thumps this a full delivery on middle to deep midwicket. Just a single
cleans him up! Another one nice and full on middle and leg, Coulter-Nile looks to heave it into the leg side and loses his leg stump
full and on off stump, presents an angled blade to deep point
full toss just outside off, he's heaved it to deep midwicket. Afridi fumbles a bit as the ball turns after pitching. Does well in the end, but the batsman race through for a couple
seeks the block hole outside off, Haddin looks to slog it away to the leg side and gets a thick inside edge through midwicket
slashed to deep cover for a couple. This was full and outside off and he cleared his leg and slams it away
length ball outside off, Haddin powers it down the ground. One-bounce to long-on who does well. Couple and he's back in strike

slower ball outside off, ends up a full toss which he drills to cover. Afridi fumbles, but he recovers quick enough to effect a run-out. Starc is the man who has to walk back, he was looking for the second run which was really not there. Might also have been a drop catch, but they get the wicket in the end
high full toss just outside off, tapped down to long-off for a single

holes out to deep midwicket! Pakistan have all but secured victory! Full and on the stumps, Haddin targets a slog to beat Malik, but he hasn't timed it well at all. The fielder runs forward and holds on to a good, low catch
fullish and outside leg, pushed through extra cover

off goes the leg stump! Pakistan have held their nerve and record a much-needed win! They're back in the World T20. This was fullish and outside leg, Hogg makes room and looks for a loft down the ground, gets an outside edge that clatters into the stumps
